pages.text: $(li)The Ancient Dart can be gave to a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/capuchin_monkey)Capuchin Monkey$(/l) to make them inflict piercing damage, making their attacks inflict damage multiple targets at the same time.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) of the $(l:patchouli:structures/jungle_monument)Jungle Monuments$(/l).
